content.title: Where can I find my balance?
subContent: Log in to your account.
Navigate to the 'Balance' section.
Your balance will be displayed on the main dashboard.

content.title: How many coins are needed to send a gift?
subContent: Different gifts require different amounts of coins.
Check the gift catalog for specific prices.
Ensure you have enough coins in your account.

content.title: How can I find and manage my earnings and rewards?
subContent: Access the 'Earnings' section from your profile.
View detailed reports of your earnings.
Manage your rewards by following the provided guidelines.

content.title: What can I get with diamonds collected through Video Gifts?
subContent: Diamonds can be exchanged for various rewards.
Visit the 'Rewards' section to see available options.
Follow the instructions to redeem your diamonds.

content.title: What can I get with diamonds collected through LIVE Gifts?
subContent: LIVE Gift diamonds can be converted to cash.
Check the conversion rates in the 'LIVE Gifts' section.
Initiate the conversion process to transfer diamonds to your account.
